New Records: C Zimbabwe recorded their first Super 12 victory at the T20 World Cup with a last-ball win over Pakistan.
Pakistan failed to chase down 130 and lost by one run in their opening match.
Key Match Events: Zimbabwe secured a dramatic one-run victory over Pakistan on the last ball.
Pakistan's chase got off to a rocky start with key wickets in the middle overs.
Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan struggled after their horror last over against India, leading to their tournament being in tatters.
Mohammed Nawaz's nightmare tournament continued with a costly error in the penultimate ball.
Post-Match Reflections: C Sikandar Raza expressed pride in the team's resilience and called the victory their best achievement.
Pakistan captain Babar Azam acknowledged their poor performance across all departments.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match saw high-scoring innings from players like Shaan Masood and Sean Williams.
Other matches included South Africa's highest partnership in tournament history and India's dominant win over the Netherlands.
Others: The article provides detailed insights into the match dynamics and performances across multiple games.
